import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { LanguageContext } from "../../context/LanguageContext"; import { translations } from "../../i18n/translations"; export default function Login() { const { lang } = useContext(LanguageContext); return ( <>
{translations[lang].forgot}
{translations[lang].create}
); }
